issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Improve test comparisons to record batch
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11319](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11319). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The test::format_batch function does not have wide range of type support (e.g. it doesn't support dictionaries) and its output makes tests hard to read / update, in my opinion. We should consolidate the tests to use `arrow::util::pretty::pretty_format_batches` both to reduce code duplication as well as increase type support

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11319?focusedCommentId=17270640) by Andrew Lamb (alamb):*
Issue resolved by pull request 9264
